short_summary: Anonymous Tipster Line to report illegal fishing activity
description: Provide statistical summary reports and access to software used for reporting illegal fishing activity The work is to be conducted in English
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title

### English: Professional Services Required to Operate a Tipster Line for Reporting of Illegal Fishing Activity

### French: Services Professionnels Nécessaires pour l'Exploitation d'une Ligne de Signalement des Activités de Pêche Illégales.

## Reference Number

- CB: 7637-18150160

## Posting Date
2023-07-27

## Tender Closing Date and Time

2023-08-18 14:00:00 (Eastern Time, Newfoundland Time Zone)

## Expected Contract Start and End Dates

Start Date: 2023-09-01
End Date: 2023-08-31 (24 months)

## Category and Method of Procurement

- Category: SRV (Software and Related Services)
- Method: Advance Contract Award Notice

## Description of Services Required
Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking professional services to operate an anonymous Tipster Line for the reporting of illegal fishing activity. The required services include:

- Provision of statistical summary reports with the following information:
	+ Tip ID Number
	+ Date and Time the Tip was received
	+ Offense Type
	+ Status of the File
- Provision of access and ongoing training for the software used by Fisheries and Oceans Canada
- Ensuring anonymity for individuals reporting illegal fishing activity
- Transmission of all relevant tips to Fisheries and Oceans Canada within 24 hours after vetting

## Software Requirements
The necessary software is related to data management and query software.

## Contracting Entity Information

* Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6, Canada

## Contact Information

* Joshua Bereza, TeleServiceExpeditor@DFO-MPO.gc.ca, (343) 576-8144

## Attachments

[Link to the tender notice document PDF files](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7637/acan---30004564.pdf)
    and
    (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7637/pac---30004564_1.pdf) 

The tenders are due by August 18, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time, Newfoundland Time Zone. The expected contract start date is September 1, 2023, and the end date is August 31,
